shapes.label: Definition of a neuron morphology, whether it comes from a stack, a slice, was synthetized in-silico, is whole brain or local to a single brain region

property.name: brain location
property.description: Brain Location of the soma (brain region, atlas space).

property.name: Morphology origin
property.description: The kind of data or material a morphology was generated from.

property.name: Soma number of points
property.description: Number of points involved in the modelisation of the soma

property.name: Number of apical dendrites
property.description: Number of apical dendrites rooting from the soma

property.name: Number of basal dendrites
property.description: Number of basal dendrites rooting from the soma

property.name: Number of axons
property.description: Number of axons rooting from the soma

property.name: Apical dendrite cumulated length
property.description: Cumulated length of all the segments of all the apical dendrites present in this morphology, in the metric unit specified in the linked brain location or spatial reference system (most likely micrometer)

property.name: Basal dendrite cumulated length
property.description: Cumulated length of all the segments of all the basal dendrites present in this morphology, in the metric unit specified in the linked brain location or spatial reference system (most likely micrometer)

property.name: Axon cumulated length
property.description: Cumulated length of all the segments of all the axons present in this morphology, in the metric unit specified in the linked brain location or spatial reference system (most likely micrometer)

property.name: Apical dendrite traversed regions
property.description: List of brain regions being traversed by the apical dendrites of this neuron morphology
property.node: nsg:ParcellationOntology <TO FIX: This is probably not the correct node/type. Here we want things like 'mba:997'>

property.name: Basal dendrite traversed regions
property.description: List of brain regions being traversed by the basal dendrites of this neuron morphology
property.datatype: nsg:ParcellationOntology <TO FIX: This is probably not the correct node/type. Here we want things like 'mba:997'

property.name: Axon traversed regions
property.description: List of brain regions being traversed by the axons of this neuron morphology
property.datatype: nsg:ParcellationOntology <TO FIX: This is probably not the correct node/type. Here we want things like 'mba:997'

property.name: Axon projection region
property.description: Brain region where the axon projection is
